Original:
被社群媒體上一則開花的可頌麵包給吸引來的。
位於內湖科學園區附近，鄰近許多商辦大樓，想用餐錯開人潮挑選晚上就不會錯啦！附近有許多停車格，還算蠻好停車的。
餐點有沙拉、麵包、薄餅類，也有幾道主食的選項，聽說這裡的起司很有名，加上有侍酒師的加持，喜歡小酌的朋友一定要來嚐嚐！
我們點了馬鈴薯濃湯、炙烤蔬菜沙拉、松露可頌、環遊法國起司拼盤和慢燉豬頰肉。
料理的風味和我們想像中的西式餐點不太一樣，為了可頌慕名而來，現刨的法國修士頭起司花讓我們有了高度的期待，標榜現烤的奶油可頌上桌時是冷的，包含內餡的松露醬有點冰，這個真的有點可惜⋯⋯，濃湯的口味還算不錯，而且熱騰騰的上桌，溫暖了我們的胃，炙烤的蔬菜沙拉也很精緻；環遊法國起司盤有AOP老米莫雷特起司、IGP薩瓦半硬質起司和拉可雷特乾酪三種口味，其中拉可雷特是偏甘苦風味的起司非常特別；慢燉豬頰肉非常軟嫩可口，整體偏甜的滋味，醬料很適合搭配麵包和起司；對了這裡的麵包口感紮實香氣十足。
用餐環境舒適，服務人員態度親切，這裡時常舉辦美食品酒活動，做為包場也很適合。
EN:
Attracted by a blossoming bread on the community media.
Located near the Neihu Science Park, there are many commercial buildings in the neighboring building. If you want to eat the wrong meal, you will not be wrong to choose a crowd.There are many parking grids nearby, which is pretty good parking.
Meals include salads, breads, and cakes, and there are several options for staple foods. I heard that the cheese here is famous. With the blessing of the sommelier, friends who like to drink must try it!
We ordered potato soup, roasted vegetable salad, truffle velvet, traveling around the French cheese platter and slow stewed pig cheeks.
The taste of cooking is not the same as the western -style meals we imagine. To praise the name of the name, the current French monk's cheese flower has high expectations. Cold, the truffle sauce containing the filling is a bit ice. This is really a pity. The taste of the thick soup is pretty good, and it is hot to serve, warming our stomach, and the roasted vegetable salad is also exquisite; There are three flavors: AOP Old Mimret's cheese, IGP Sava Half Hedie Cheese and Racred Cheese. Among them, Racred is a sweet and bitter cheese. Slowly stewed The pork cheeks are very soft and delicious, the overall sweet taste, the sauce is very suitable for bread and cheese; by the way, the bread has a solid aroma.
The dining environment is comfortable and the service staff attitude is cordial. Here are often organized for food and wine, which is also very suitable for charter.

Original:
Sure, here is a summary of the internal appeal in the format of a Google review:
標題：適合聚餐聊天但不適合吃飽

我最近參加了Open day活動，這個活動是品嚐會，每人 500 元，現場有汽泡酒、紅、白酒十多種，火腿、香腸、果醬等食物。

Original: Le Comptoir 是一家美麗的法國葡萄酒小酒館，擁有非常寬敞且溫馨的用餐空間。自然光線充足，桌子佈置得很好。這裡有一個零售區，您可以在那裡購買一些美味的起司、醃肉和美酒。平日，他們提供特價午餐，物超所值。  他們經常舉辦品酒活動，所以一定要加入他們的 VIP 名單才能獲得邀請。
EN: Le Comptoir is a beautiful French wine tavern with a very spacious and warm dining space.Natural light is sufficient, and the table is well arranged.There is a retail area here, where you can buy some delicious cheese, pickled meat and wine.On weekdays, they offer special lunch, which is worthy of money.They often hold wine tasting activities, so they must join their VIP list to get invitations.

Original: 服務真的很好，服務生很貼心，很熱情。食物也很有品味，有很多選擇，種類繁多的歐式食物。飲料真的很不錯，而且是更西式的飲料，在台灣大多數餐廳都不常見。氣氛和設計簡潔而友好。我絕對會推薦這家餐廳。
EN: The service is really good, the waiter is intimate and enthusiastic.Food is also very tasteful, there are many choices, a wide variety of European foods.The drink is really good, and it is a more western -style drink. Most restaurants in Taiwan are not common.The atmosphere and design are simple and friendly.I will definitely recommend this restaurant.

Original: 我在這裡吃了商務午餐。紅燒豬臉肉配烤馬鈴薯和胡蘿蔔真是太棒了！肉的嫩度恰到好處，配菜也很完美。
EN: I have a business lunch here.The braised pork face with roasted potatoes and carrots is really great!The tenderness of the meat is just right, and the side dishes are perfect.

Original: 城裡最好的法國菜。
EN: The best French cuisine in the city.

Original: 我來自法國，通常對台灣的法國菜很挑剔。我非常喜歡Comptoir Neihu：空間大、明亮、非常舒適。他們的菜單上沒有太多選擇，這是食譜執行良好和食材新鮮的好兆頭。起司羊角麵包在法國是看不到的，但這是一個絕妙的主意：它看起來不錯，加上鬆露奶油，味道濃鬱而芳香。所有經典的法國菜餚都很美味。當然，起司、葡萄酒等都是台灣品質最好的。如果你想體驗法國的味道，就去Comptoir Neihu吧。他們也有大桌子，所以我認為這是團體和生日的一個很好的選擇。
EN: I am from France and is usually very picky about French cuisine in Taiwan.I really like Comptoir Neihu: Large space, bright, and very comfortable.There is not much choice on their menus. This is a good sign of good recipes and fresh ingredients.The cheese Yangjiao bread is invisible in France, but this is a wonderful idea: it looks good, plus truffle cream, the taste is rich and fragrant.All classic French dishes are delicious.Of course, cheese, wine, etc. are the best quality in Taiwan.If you want to experience the taste of France, go to Comptoir Neihu.They also have large tables, so I think this is a good choice for groups and birthdays.

氛圍很棒，讓您感受到現代法國的氛圍，並提供完美的葡萄酒選擇。時間不長，但就在現場…然後美食體驗絕對是你在台北能得到的最好的體驗之一！
EN:
The new place in the city is definitely a must -have place ...

The atmosphere is great, so that you can feel the atmosphere of modern France and provide perfect wine choices.Time is not long, but at the scene ... and then the food experience is definitely one of the best experiences you can get in Taipei!
